title: Does anyone have proper handwritten notes for Compiler Design?
content: I failed in this subject because I didn't understand much, and the slides are also difficult to understand. Maybe notes would be better to comprehend.

comments.body: We used to refer to Preet's recorded lectures, they were equivalent to the Bible for us. They're very detailed and she teaches really well. If the syllabus hasn't changed from my batch, maybe you can ask around for it.

As suggested, This is Preet Ma'am's drive. It also has the recorded lectures. All the best , you'll Ace it this time.   
[https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1KxJPkQ4\_rAXbEzmMLhecSmOCwHtAzOxA](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1KxJPkQ4_rAXbEzmMLhecSmOCwHtAzOxA)

Wow these are the same ones created for my batch :D

The only thing that saved my ass in this course lol
Bro watch gate smashers video by searching each topics. Best way to get good marks.
Preet Ma'am herself uses the same for teaching and shares it.
Classic Indian piece of sht the parasite of the world
